Question
========
  
For a survey on political affiliation and gender, each person in the sample is asked which political party they voted for in the last House of Representatives elections in 2013. The following properties apply to this variable: 
Answerlist
----------
* Numeric, ordinal and continuous.
* Categorical, ordinal and discrete.
* Numeric, nominal and continuous.
* Categorical, nominal and discrete.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
